Job Title: Job opening For Software Developer NAV profile with MNC Company
Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities  To handle small & medium size projects (end to end) independently  Execute projects using Microsoft Implementation Methodology, following Best practices  Undertake the design, coding, testing, releasing the code, and NAV / Dynamics 365 Business Central support  Experience working on the technical side of Dynamics NAV / Dynamics 365 Business Central  Experience in working on full life cycle implementations across multiple versions of Dynamics NAV / Dynamics 365 Business CentralDesired Candidate Profile   Should have worked in the versions from NAV 2009 to NAV 2018 and Business Central  Should have completed at least 3-4 full life cycle implementation (Full Life Cycle = General Ledger, Accounts Receivable, Accounts Payable, Fixed Assets, Budget, Cash flow, SCM, Inventory, Manufacturing)  Should have exposure to upgrades/migration projects and good knowledge in MS Implementation methodologies  Exposure Power BI, SSRS is add on advantage  Strong understanding of Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2009 to 2018  Proficient in RDLC Report Development & SQL Server Database  Should be fluent and conversant with (A/L, C/AL & C/Side) Programming and ability to do developments independently  Excellent communication and problem-solving skills  Excellent understanding and knowledge of core Microsoft Dynamics NAV modules  Should work and collaborate in a team environment  Should be good in English and Communication
